page.title: 16Trade and Services 1
page.content: This is where we buy these items :_ Footwear and Clothing- Oban,Glasgow, Edinburgh,Mail Orders,travelling merchants in hotels at Lochgilphead, Ardrishaig. Furniture-Oban,Glasgow,Mail Orders, Milk,Newspapers-Post lady brings to village daily. Frozen Food-village shop&Lochgilphead. Petrol/diesel-Bellanoch,Lochgilphead. Machines/tools-Kintyre farmers, Mcgilps. Fuel-Coal is delivered fortnightly from Lochgilphead. Prescription-Chemist in Lochgilphead. Alcohol-hotels,some people make beer & wine,licensed grocers. This is where we have these services:- Library-Mobile comes to area every 4 weeks. Banks-Bank of Scotland,Clydesdale in Lochgilphead &Ardrishaig,Trustee
